author: jochen
msg: The Unmarshaller is now creating the attributes xsi:schemaLocation and xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation properly.

author: jochen
msg: Build system now based on Ant 1.6. (The Ant tasks being used at runtime still depend on Ant 1.5.)
Added the SPG package, a SAX Parser Generator based on external parser generators like Ant or
Beaver. Soon to be used for generating the unmarshalling handlers.

author: jochen
msg: Restrictions of simple list types didn't have the isList() property set. Likewise for union types.
